definition: to improve taste/to make sth palatable
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
taste/smell/(fig.) (noun suffix) feel/quality/sense/(TCM) classifier for ingredients of a medicine prescription

sentences.english: Borscht can be spiced up with roasted apples and smoked goose breast.
sentences.chinese: 罗宋汤可以用烘烤过的苹果和熏鹅脯来提味。

sentences.english: Many of Malay dishes are added Belacan to increase tastes.
sentences.chinese: 许多马来佳肴都会加入峇拉煎来提味。

sentences.english: Were it not so, far better would it be to fail, for happiness is the wine that sharpens the taste of the meal.
sentences.chinese: 如果不这样，我会失败，因为快乐是提味的美酒佳酿。

sentences.english: Bakers use this nutty-flavored seed mainly to add flavor and fiber.
sentences.chinese: 这种坚果味的种子多被烘焙师用作提味和丰富纤维的。

definition: umami, one of the five basic tastes (cookery)
